title-part.text: FOODS, FOODSTUFFS, OR NON-ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES, NOT COVERED BY SUBCLASSES A23B - A23J
THEIR PREPARATION OR TREATMENT, e.g. COOKING, MODIFICATION OF NUTRITIVE QUALITIES, PHYSICAL TREATMENT

note.note-paragraph: In groups A23L3/3472 - A23L3/3562, the last place priority rule is applied, i.e. at each hierarchical level, in the absence of an indication to the contrary, classification is made in the last appropriate place. This Note corresponds to IPC Note (1) relating to A23L3/3472 - A23L3/3562

In groups A23L3/3472 - A23L3/3562, the last place priority rule is applied, i.e. at each hierarchical level, in the absence of an indication to the contrary, classification is made in the last appropriate place.
This Note corresponds to IPC Note relating to A23L3/3472 - A23L3/3562.

title-part.text: Flakes or other shapes of ready-to-eat type
Coated, filled, multilayered or hollow ready-to-eat cereals

made from wholegrain or grain pieces without preparation of meal or dough

made from wholegrain or grain pieces without preparation of meal or dough

Preparation of puffed cereals from wholegrain or grain pieces without preparation of meal or dough

Products in which the original granular shape is maintained, e.g. parboiled rice

note.note-paragraph:
Group A23L11/00 is impacted by reclassification into groups A23L11/40, A23L11/45, A23L11/60, A23L11/65, and A23L11/70.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.
